title: Project-Based Learning Course for Strengthening Digital Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone and internet usage skills
context.additional_context: Participants perform digital tool-dependent administrative roles in workplace settings, with instruction delivered in constrained tech environments (no PCs, smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Learners can produce project deliverables using smartphone-based digital tools (collaboration tools, document editing apps, etc.) to enhance work efficiency.
Learners can select reliable resources applicable to their tasks through online information search and evaluation.
Learners can perform tasks in real-time and share feedback with team members using digital collaboration platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
